statements: SELECT * FROM InvestmentPortfolio
SELECT asset_name, current_value FROM InvestmentPortfolio ORDER BY current_value DESC
SELECT asset_type, purchase_price, quantity FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT asset_name, purchase_price, current_value FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE purchase_price >= 1000
SELECT id, asset_name, purchase_date, total_investment FROM InvestmentPortfolio ORDER BY purchase_date ASC
SELECT id, asset_name, current_value FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE purchase_price > 1000 ORDER BY current_value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, quantity, total_investment FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY asset_type ASC, total_investment DESC;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE quantity >= 100 AND total_investment < 50000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, purchase_price ASC;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_price, current_value FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE asset_type = 'Stocks' AND quantity > 50 ORDER BY asset_name ASC, purchase_price DESC;

SELECT id, asset_name, asset_type, purchase_date, total_investment FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE purchase_price < current_value AND total_investment < 100000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC, total_investment DESC;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_data WHERE shares_owned > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, purchase_price FROM portfolio_data WHERE purchase_price > 50.00;
SELECT stock_symbol, return_on_investment FROM performance_metrics WHERE return_on_investment > 0.15 ORDER BY stock_symbol;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_data WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' AND purchase_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY purchase_date;
SELECT stock_symbol, volatility FROM performance_metrics WHERE sharpe_ratio > 1.5;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_data WHERE purchase_price > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT stock_symbol, shares_owned FROM portfolio_data WHERE shares_owned BETWEEN 100 AND 500
SELECT id, return_on_investment, volatility FROM performance_metrics WHERE return_on_investment > 0.05 ORDER BY return_on_investment DESC
SELECT * FROM portfolio_data WHERE stock_symbol LIKE 'AAPL%'
SELECT SUM(shares_owned) AS total_shares_owned FROM portfolio_data
SELECT * FROM Portfolio;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_value FROM Portfolio WHERE total_value > 1000;
SELECT investment_name, investment_value FROM Investment ORDER BY investment_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT portfolio_name, COUNT(investment_id) AS Total_Investments FROM Investment GROUP BY portfolio_id HAVING COUNT(investment_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM Portfolio;
SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_name FROM Portfolio ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM Investment WHERE investment_value > 1000;
SELECT investment_name, investment_value FROM Investment WHERE investment_type = 'Stock';
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_amount < 0 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Portfolio_Information;
SELECT * FROM Holdings WHERE cost_basis > 1000;
SELECT portfolio_name, investment_firm FROM Portfolio_Information ORDER BY portfolio_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_type, amount FROM Transactions WHERE amount < -500;
SELECT security_id, number_of_shares FROM Holdings WHERE portfolio_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM Portfolio_Information;
SELECT portfolio_name, investment_firm FROM Portfolio_Information ORDER BY investment_firm DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT client_id FROM Portfolio_Information WHERE investment_firm = 'ABC Investment';
SELECT * FROM Holdings JOIN Portfolio_Information ON Holdings.portfolio_id = Portfolio_Information.id;
SELECT security_id, SUM(number_of_shares) AS total_shares FROM Holdings GROUP BY security_id ORDER BY total_shares DESC;
SELECT * FROM portfolios;
SELECT user_id, portfolio_name, total_value FROM portfolios WHERE total_value > 10000 ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT asset_name, quantity, cost_price FROM holdings WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'buy' AND transaction_amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM portfolios LIMIT 5;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_value FROM portfolios ORDER BY total_value DESC;

SELECT u.username, p.portfolio_name, h.asset_name, t.transaction_amount FROM users u JOIN portfolios p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN holdings h ON p.id = h.portfolio_id JOIN transactions t ON h.holding_id = t.holding_id WHERE u.username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT p.portfolio_name, SUM(h.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM portfolios p JOIN holdings h ON p.id = h.portfolio_id GROUP BY p.portfolio_name HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(p.id) AS portfolio_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN portfolios p ON u.user_id = p.user_id GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY portfolio_count DESC;
